definition[0]: the state of being completely certain
example[0]: The result is impossible to predict with any degree of certainty.
example[1]: She knew with absolute certainty that he’d say no.
definition[1]: the fact that something is certain to happen
example[3]: There’s no certainty that he’ll remember.
definition[2]: something that is definitely true or that will definitely happen
example[4]: He usually does quite well, but it’s not a certainty.
example[5]: The only certainty is that there will need to be major changes.
